page.title: 10Don't Talk to Strangers
page.content: Everyone has been very worried recently about the number of children who have been tempted into cars and assaulted. Two girls from our school were followed by a man in a car on their way to school. The police and the local newspaper have started a campaign to warn children about the dangers of strangers who appear friendly but could hurt them. They brought with them a film and some leaflets. Unfortunately, some of the younger children got rather excited, and got into a right panic when a workman with a beard they had never seen before walked into the school. In fact, young children seem very nervous of men with beards - even though our teacher has one.
